name: SL Flight Training
about: SL Flight Training is a premier aviation academy dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. With a focus on accelerated and standard training programs, we offer flexible pacing to suit individual goals. Our fleet includes the youngest glass-cockpit aircraft in the region, along with state-of-the-art immersive simulators for scenario-based training. As a FAA Part 141 and EASA accredited school, we maintain a 96% graduation rate. Our team of full-time, experienced instructors is passionate about teaching, ensuring students receive the highest level of training. At SL Flight Training, we are committed to building your executive skills and preparing you for a successful career in aviation.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
